title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Honesty is a double-edged sword. Simmering tensions between you and a loved one likely boil over now. You cant rely on subtleties to express how you feel today. You must be straightforward or someone could overpower your message by shifting the focus to your past mistakes, instead. Communicating your emotions clearly can be tricky while elusive Neptune confuses interactive Mercury in your 7th House of Others. Stay as calm as possible but speak your truth. Buddha said, Holding onto anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
